Specimen Type: Formalin-fixed paraffin-embedded (FFPE) tissue blocks or unstained slides
Purpose: To prepare, stain, and microscopically examine client-embedded hematopathology specimens for accurate diagnostic reporting.
Container: Tissue block cassette or slide mailer/transport container with proper labeling
Equipment: Microtome, water bath, oven, microscope, staining instruments/reagents, coverslipping instruments
